org.apache.reef.client

Class DriverServiceConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.reef.tang.formats.ConfigurationModuleBuilder
      • org.apache.reef.client.DriverServiceConfiguration

  • public final class DriverServiceConfiguration
extends ConfigurationModuleBuilder
    Use this ConfigurationModule to configure Services to be run in the Driver.

    A service is a set of event handlers that are informed of events in addition to * the event handlers defined in DriverConfiguration. However, most services will treat the events as read-only. Doing differently should be documented clearly in the Service documentation.

    • Field Detail

      • GLOBAL_FILES

        public static final OptionalParameter<String> GLOBAL_FILES
        Files to be made available on the Driver and all Evaluators.

      • GLOBAL_LIBRARIES

        public static final OptionalParameter<String> GLOBAL_LIBRARIES
        Libraries to be made available on the Driver and all Evaluators.

      • LOCAL_FILES

        public static final OptionalParameter<String> LOCAL_FILES
        Files to be made available on the Driver only.

      • LOCAL_LIBRARIES

        public static final OptionalParameter<String> LOCAL_LIBRARIES
        Libraries to be made available on the Driver only.

      • ON_DRIVER_STARTED

        public static final RequiredImpl<EventHandler<StartTime>> ON_DRIVER_STARTED
        The event handler invoked right after the driver boots up.

      • ON_DRIVER_STOP

        public static final OptionalImpl<EventHandler<StopTime>> ON_DRIVER_STOP
        The event handler invoked right before the driver shuts down. Defaults to ignore.

      • ON_EVALUATOR_ALLOCATED

        public static final OptionalImpl<EventHandler<AllocatedEvaluator>> ON_EVALUATOR_ALLOCATED
        Event handler for allocated evaluators. Defaults to returning the evaluator if not bound.

      • ON_EVALUATOR_COMPLETED

        public static final OptionalImpl<EventHandler<CompletedEvaluator>> ON_EVALUATOR_COMPLETED
        Event handler for completed evaluators. Defaults to logging if not bound.

      • ON_EVALUATOR_FAILED

        public static final OptionalImpl<EventHandler<FailedEvaluator>> ON_EVALUATOR_FAILED
        Event handler for failed evaluators. Defaults to job failure if not bound.

      • ON_TASK_MESSAGE

        public static final OptionalImpl<EventHandler<TaskMessage>> ON_TASK_MESSAGE
        Event handler for task messages. Defaults to logging if not bound.

      • ON_TASK_COMPLETED

        public static final OptionalImpl<EventHandler<CompletedTask>> ON_TASK_COMPLETED
        Event handler for completed tasks. Defaults to closing the context the task ran on if not bound.

      • ON_TASK_FAILED

        public static final OptionalImpl<EventHandler<FailedTask>> ON_TASK_FAILED
        Event handler for failed tasks. Defaults to job failure if not bound.

      • ON_TASK_RUNNING

        public static final OptionalImpl<EventHandler<RunningTask>> ON_TASK_RUNNING
        Event handler for running tasks. Defaults to logging if not bound.

      • ON_DRIVER_RESTART_TASK_RUNNING

        public static final OptionalImpl<EventHandler<RunningTask>> ON_DRIVER_RESTART_TASK_RUNNING
        Event handler for running tasks in previous evaluator, when driver restarted. Defaults to logging if not bound.

      • ON_TASK_SUSPENDED

        public static final OptionalImpl<EventHandler<SuspendedTask>> ON_TASK_SUSPENDED
        Event handler for suspended tasks. Defaults to job failure if not bound. Rationale: many jobs don't support task suspension. Hence, this parameter should be optional. The only sane default is to crash the job, then.

      • ON_CONTEXT_ACTIVE

        public static final OptionalImpl<EventHandler<ActiveContext>> ON_CONTEXT_ACTIVE
        Event handler for active context. Defaults to closing the context if not bound.

      • ON_DRIVER_RESTART_CONTEXT_ACTIVE

        public static final OptionalImpl<EventHandler<ActiveContext>> ON_DRIVER_RESTART_CONTEXT_ACTIVE
        Event handler for active context when driver restart. Defaults to closing the context if not bound.

      • ON_CONTEXT_CLOSED

        public static final OptionalImpl<EventHandler<ClosedContext>> ON_CONTEXT_CLOSED
        Event handler for closed context. Defaults to logging if not bound.

      • ON_CONTEXT_FAILED

        public static final OptionalImpl<EventHandler<FailedContext>> ON_CONTEXT_FAILED
        Event handler for closed context. Defaults to job failure if not bound.

      • ON_CONTEXT_MESSAGE

        public static final OptionalImpl<EventHandler<ContextMessage>> ON_CONTEXT_MESSAGE
        Event handler for context messages. Defaults to logging if not bound.

      • CONF

        public static final ConfigurationModule CONF
        ConfigurationModule to fill out to get a legal Driver Configuration.
